text: Michael Yeadon, who wrote that there is absolutely no need for vaccines to extinguish the pandemic, was once Pfizer's chief scientific officer.
entity_strings: Michael Yeadon, Pfizer, chief scientific officer

text: Michael Yeadon, a former employee of Pfizer, said that the government rollout of the COVID-19 vaccine is an attempt at mass depopulation with booster recipients expected to die within two years.
